page.title: 10VALLEY PROJECT CONTD.
page.content:
This gives plenty of scope for rambling, bird watching, having a picnic, studying pond life, tracing the line of the canal, jogging, dog-walking, or simply finding a grassy bank to sit and enjoy the scenery. The day we went to the valley we went into the visitors centre and asked some questions:-
"When did work for the re-development of the valley start? "The secretary told us, "The work began in 1976." At that one of the rangers told us that, "The rangers came in 1979 and this Visitors Centre was built in 1982." Our next question was, "How many people are employed at Sankey Valley?" The ranger answered "There are four full-time rangers, a part-time ranger and the secretary.
